member.name: IMFSensorActivitiesReportCallback.OnActivitiesReport
member.summary: Raised by the media pipeline when a new is available.
member.param: Receives a pointer to the new .
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFSensorActivitiesReportCallback
member.summary: Interface implemented by the client to receive callbacks when sensor activity reports are available.
